Export.zv: Cache for UNIX (Red Hat Enterprise Linux for x86-64) 2014.1.3 (Build 775U)

Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation:
Write "" Write !,"" Do ..WriteTitlePane("@Ensemble:HL7ManagerDataStructure@Ensemble HL7 Data Structure") Write !,"
" Write !,!,"
" Write "HL7 Data Structure Definition is displayed below:" Write "
" Write !,! #Include EnsHL7 set tPath=%request.Get("PATH") set ms=%request.Get("MS") set ss=%request.Get("SS") set iField=%request.Get("FIELD") set ds=%request.Get("DS") set ds1=%request.Get("DS1") set ds1Field=%request.Get("DS1FIELD") set category=$p(ds,":",2) set secondary=$p(ds,":",3) If ((category'="")&&(secondary'="")) { set description=..EscapeHTML($G($$$vaSchemaDescGbl(category,"DS",secondary))) if $D($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"DS",secondary))=0 { write ""_ds_" Definition does not exist!",! quit } } Write ! If '($L(tPath)) Goto %csp00001 ;{ Write !,"
" Write "Path you followed to get to this data structure: "_(tPath)_"
",! Write " " If '($L(ds1Field)) Goto %csp00002 ;{ Write !," Data Structure  '"_($P(ds1,":",2,3))_"', field # "_(ds1Field)_",
",! Write " " %csp00002 ;} Write !," At Field# "_(iField)_"
",! Write " Of Segment Structure  '"_($P(ss,":",2,3))_"',
",! Write " Of Message Structure  '"_($P(ms,":",2,3))_"'" Write "
" Write ! %csp00001 ;} Write !,!,"
" Write !,"",! Write !,"",! Write !,"",! Write ! If ((category'="")&&(secondary'="")) { set struct=$$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"DS",secondary) kill names set name="" for { set name=$O($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"DS",secondary,"names",name)) quit:name="" set names($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"DS",secondary,"names",name))=name } For i=1:1:$LL(struct) { Set value=$LG(struct,i) write "" write "" ; description set description=..EscapeHTML($G($$$vaSchemaDescGbl(category,"DS",secondary,i))) write "" ; property name set tPropPath=$S(""=tPath||(""=$G(names(i))):"",1:tPath_"."_$G(names(i))) write "" ; data structure write "" ; code table set value=$G($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"DS",secondary,"tables",i)) write "" ; alternate description set altdesc=..EscapeHTML($G($$$vaSchemaDescGbl(category,"DS",secondary,i,"alt"))) write "" write "",! } } Write !,!,"
"_(category_":"_secondary)_" "_($G(description))_"
ComponentDescriptionProperty NameData StructureCode Table
Alternate
Description
"_i_"",$S(description="":" ",1:description),""_$G(names(i)," ")_"",$S(value="":" ",1:""_value_""),"",$S(value="":" ",1:""_value_""),"",$S(altdesc="":" ",1:altdesc),"
",! Write !,"

",! Write "" Write "(Show All Categories)" Write "" Write "
",! Write "" Write "(Show All Data Structures in Category '"_(category)_"')" Write "" Write !,"

" Write !,!,""

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>Ensemble HL7 Data Structure</title>",! Write "<link rel=""stylesheet"" type=""text/css"" href=""/csp/sys/csputils.css"" title=""Standard Style""/>" Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html>" Write ! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
